NIOP-E, Sta. 612: Seychelles, Mahé, E coast, Cap Maçons /Anse de Forbans; 04°46'S 55°31'E; intertidal, tidal reef flat and slightly declining reef slope; depth 0.5 m; snorkeling; under stones;12.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 609: Seychelles, Mahé, NW coast, Vista Do Mar; 04°34'S 55°26'E; depth 6 m, beach with beachrock and granitic boulders, sandy bottom at 4-9 m, scuba diving; on Culcitta schmiediella;11.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.

NIOP-E, Sta. 601: Seychelles, Mahé, NE coast, Anse Nord D'Est; 04°34'S 55°28'E; outer reef flat, slightly sloping down; depth ca. 3 m; snorkeling; between corrallites of Galaxea fascicularis; 5.xii.1992; collected by C.H.J.M. Fransen.
